pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī gilānā hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.3: Atha kho aññataro upāsako yena thullanandā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.6: “Amukassa, ayye, āpaṇikassa ghare kahāpaṇaṃ nikkhipissāmi, tato yaṃ iccheyyāsi taṃ āharāpeyyāsī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.8: “gaccha, sikkhamāne, amukassa āpaṇikassa gharā kahāpaṇassa telaṃ āharā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.9: Atha kho sā sikkhamānā tassa āpaṇikassa gharā kahāpaṇassa telaṃ āharitvā thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā adāsi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.11: “na me, sikkhamāne, telena attho, sappinā me attho”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.12: Atha kho sā sikkhamānā yena so āpaṇiko tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ āpaṇikaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.13: “na kira, āvuso, ayyāya telena attho, sappinā attho, handa te telaṃ, sappiṃ me dehī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.14: “Sace mayaṃ, ayye, vikkītaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ puna ādiyissāma, kadā amhākaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ vikkāyissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.15: Telassa kayena telaṃ haṭaṃ, sappissa kayaṃ āhara, sappiṃ harissasī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.16: Atha kho sā sikkhamānā rodantī aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.19: Atha kho sā sikkhamānā bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.20: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.21: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā aññaṃ cetāpetvā aññaṃ cetāpessatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.22: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī aññaṃ cetāpetvā aññaṃ cetāpetī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.25: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī aññaṃ cetāpetvā aññaṃ cetāpessati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.27: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:1.28: “Yā pana bhikkhunī aññaṃ cetāpetvā aññaṃ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.8: taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ cetāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.10: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā ekabhikkhuniyā vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.13: “idaṃ me, ayye, aññaṃ cetāpetvā aññaṃ cetāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ, imāhaṃ saṃghassa nissajjāmī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.17: Aññe aññasaññā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.18: Aññe vematikā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.19: Aññe anaññasaññā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.20: Anaññe aññasaññā anaññaṃ cetāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.21: Anaññe vematikā anaññaṃ cetāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
